Reviews.Title: ViewSonic Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: For a bare bones LED TV, this thing is great. The image quality is suburb! Playing HD movies and games looks crisp and clear. I must also say that ViewSonic is a quality brand! This will be the second ViewSonic TV that I have owned and they have yet to disappoint!

ProductInfo.Features:
42-Inch LED Full HD 1920x1080p resolution
Energy saving WLED technology
User programmable calibration
Automated RS232 control port
IR remote pass through
ProductInfo.Name: ViewSonic VT4236LED 42-Inch 60Hz LED-Lit TV (Black)
